data.title: Use Sinhala unicode with Matlab
data.text:
I have built a program to identfy braille characters from an image, there's no issue with program my program. It wroks correctly with English.

font=[font letter];

I take identified letters into above array,

fileID = fopen('text.text','w'); fprintf(fileID,'%s',font); fclose(fileID); winopen('text.text')

Then I print those letters into txt file using above code. Now I need to improve this to identify Sinhala braille, therefore I need to use Sinhala instead of English. Therefore I have to use Unicode. I don't know how to use this with MATLAB. Please help me. I have uploaded image of Sinhala unicodes here.
